title: Brits told wash clothes after UK nerve agent attack
text:
Brits told wash clothes after UK nerve agent attack 12:12pm EDT - 01:20 
UK diners have been told to wash their possessions if they were at the pub or restaurant where the former Russian spy and his daughter were poisoned by a nerve agent.   
UK diners have been told to wash their possessions if they were at the pub or restaurant where the former Russian spy and his daughter were poisoned by a nerve agent.  //reut.rs/2p5TIRT
